trans-unit.source: Represents a set of selected dates in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 選択した日付のセットを表す、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Dates can be added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 日付は<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>に追加することができます。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, adding a date or a range to the SelectedDatesCollection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 値に応じて、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティ、日付または範囲を SelectedDatesCollection に追加する可能性がありますをクリアする</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 方法を次の表にリスト<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>に影響を与える、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>。

trans-unit.source: |CalendarSelectionMode|Effect on SelectedDates| |---------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: |CalendarSelectionMode |SelectedDates への影響 | |---------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|選択内容は許可されていません</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>設定することはできませんし、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>に値を追加することです |。 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|1 つの日付のみを選択することができます、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>または<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>最初の値</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>を設定するか</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>使用することはできません |。 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|単一の日付の範囲を選択することができます</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>を設定、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>に個別に日時が追加または<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>から以前のすべての値がクリアされます |。 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|日付の複数の不連続な範囲を選択することができます</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>または<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>クリアされません</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>を使用</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>する日付を個別に追加します。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>もクリアされます<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>が、追加の日付または範囲を追加し、ことができます</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.|
trans-unit.target: 範囲の和集合の結果の既に選択されている一部の日付を含む範囲や別の範囲と重複を追加して、例外は発生しません |。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> associated with this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref>このコレクションに関連付けられています。

trans-unit.source: Adds all the dates in the specified range, which includes the first and last dates, to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初と最後の日付が含まれている、指定した範囲内のすべての日付をコレクションに追加します。

trans-unit.source: The first date to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: コレクションに追加する最初の日付。

trans-unit.source: The last date to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: コレクションに追加する最後の日付。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。
